name: Super Simple Resume Template
description:
The events of 2020 left lots of people without work. Writing a resume when you weren't expecting to be searching for a job can be daunting.


I hope this small set of autolayout components and sample templates can help make starting on a resume super simple.


--


Components are mixable, swappable, and deletable so feel free to play around with type and layout and do some crazy and experimental remixes!
